description.value:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

When you crack open this soft, spongy seedpod, you can use it as a catalyst when casting a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mist] spell. When you do, irritating pollen fills the area for the spell's duration. Creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15] saving throw to avoid sneezing uncontrollably. On a failed save, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for 1 round. Rather than last for the duration of the spell, the irritating pollen only remains in the area for 1 round. A creature that succeeds at this saving throw becomes temporarily immune to the irritating seedpod's pollen for 10 minutes.
